reviewtext: I've been getting these for about $3.50 shipped.  I've been using them as gifts for birthdays, Christmas, etc.  I know people think I shelled out more than that.  When listening to music and especially Celtic Woman videos the sound comes across so clear, vibrant and full I am awestruck.  I've owned more expensive headphones.  My current "good" set cost 20X that on sale and they are better in every way than these.  Except in weight.  My "good" set has very linear response that is awesome too and the HT-21 is base heavy.  That's not always a bad thing.  I can hear the drums and the base line without blowing my eardrums out with the rest of it.  I like that.  The cord is also nicely long, substantial and has an angle plug.  It just doesn't get any better.
